${modID}:ArtificialWing.NAME: Artificial Wing
${modID}:ArtificialWing.FLAVOR: A artificial wing made out of dried plants and leafs. No tool can stop a cripple from being a cripple.
DESCRIPTIONS: The first 0 cost attack played each turn draws a card.

${modID}:MechanicalWing.NAME: Mechanical Wing
${modID}:MechanicalWing.FLAVOR: Sturdy wing crafted by the goblins of The Spire. Curiously, no one has ever seen a goblin fly.
DESCRIPTIONS: You are immune to cripple effects.

${modID}:HemlockMoth.NAME: Hemlock Moth
${modID}:HemlockMoth.FLAVOR: Some Moths give off a pheromone that causes fever in animals with compromised immune systems.

${modID}:BattleOils.NAME: Battle Oils
